QuestData.Title: His Name Was... Stormstout
QuestData.Description: An unusual pandaren came through town a few days back. He told a better tale than Pan, drank twice as much as Lee, and then beat me up in front of the bar. All while his little niece made fun of us.$b$bIt was awesome.$b$bThey said they were headed to the Valley of the Four Winds. You should meet him! Just... watch out for that right hook.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout at the Thunderfoot Fields in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha ha! You were sent by Bolo? The "Keg Mender," right? From the Drunken Hozen?$b$bHow is his eye healing? Is his friend still hung over?$b$bAhh... that was an enjoyable evening.
